cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitetsu

sentence.kanji: 私は私鉄の職員です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha shitetsu no shokuin desu
sentence.english: I'm an employee of a private railway company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuuri

sentence.kanji: 資格があると就職に有利です。
sentence.romaji: shikaku ga aru to shuushoku ni yuuri desu
sentence.english: It's advantageous to have qualifications when looking for work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sukuu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は通りがかりの人に救われたよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha toorigakari no hito ni sukuwareta yo
sentence.english: She was saved by a passing stranger.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sukui

sentence.kanji: 娘の存在が私の救いでした。
sentence.romaji: musume no sonzai ga watashi no sukui deshita
sentence.english: My daughter's existence saved me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shousuu

sentence.kanji: 小数は切り捨てて計算して下さい。
sentence.romaji: shousuu ha kirisutete keisan shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please round down the decimal and then calculate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は球技が大好きです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kyuugi ga daisuki desu
sentence.english: He loves ball games.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nichibei

sentence.kanji: テレビで日米野球をやっていますよ。
sentence.romaji: terebi de nichibei yakyuu wo yate imasu yo
sentence.english: A Japan vs. U.S. baseball game is being shown on television.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's denkyuu

sentence.kanji: 電球が切れたので交換しましょう。
sentence.romaji: denkyuu ga kireta no de koukan shimashou
sentence.english: The bulb has blown so shall I change it?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kisuu

sentence.kanji: 3は奇数です。
sentence.romaji: san ha kisuu desu
sentence.english: Three is an odd number.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenchiku

sentence.kanji: 彼らは家を建築中です。
sentence.romaji: karera ha ie wo kenchikuchuu desu
sentence.english: They are in the middle of building a house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koutei

sentence.kanji: 全部で6時間の行程です。
sentence.romaji: zenbu de rokujikan no koutei desu
sentence.english: It is a six-hour journey in all.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nitei

sentence.kanji: 試験の日程が発表されました。
sentence.romaji: shiken no nitei ga hapyou saremashita
sentence.english: The examination schedule was announced.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hisho

sentence.kanji: 私の秘書はとても優秀です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no hisho ha totemo yuushuu desu
sentence.english: My secretary is quite exceptional.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's watakushi

sentence.kanji: 私は北海道の出身です。
sentence.romaji: watakushi ha hokaidou no shushin desu
sentence.english: I'm from Hokkaido.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okusama

sentence.kanji: 社長の奥様はきれいな方です。
sentence.romaji: shachou no okusama ha kirei na kata desu
sentence.english: The president's wife is a beautiful woman.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saku

sentence.kanji: その問題に対する策を皆で考えたの。
sentence.romaji: sono mondai ni taisuru saku wo minna de kangaeta no
sentence.english: We all thought about measures to address the problem.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's motomeru

sentence.kanji: 子供は親の愛を求めます。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ha oya no ai wo motomemasu
sentence.english: Children need their parents' love.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maigo

sentence.kanji: うちの子が迷子になりました。
sentence.romaji: uchi no ko ga maigo ni narimashita
sentence.english: Our child has gotten lost.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nazo

sentence.kanji: ピラミッドには謎が多いんだ。
sentence.romaji: piramido ni ha nazo ga ooi n da
sentence.english: There are a lot of mysteries about the pyramids.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenri

sentence.kanji: 私たちには知る権利があります。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ni ha shiru kenri ga arimasu
sentence.english: We have the right to know.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's risoku

sentence.kanji: 預金には利息がつきます。
sentence.romaji: yokin ni ha risoku ga tsukimasu
sentence.english: Savings gain interest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wago

sentence.kanji: 日本で生まれた言葉を和語といいます。
sentence.romaji: nipon de umareta kotoba wo wago to iimasu
sentence.english: The words created in Japan are called indigenous Japanese words.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's baikin

sentence.kanji: 傷口にばい菌が入った。
sentence.romaji: kizuguchi ni baikin ga haita
sentence.english: Some bacteria got into the wound.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's irui

sentence.kanji: 衣類の整理をしたよ。
sentence.romaji: irui no seiri wo shita yo
sentence.english: I organized the clothes.

cards.english: some time ago, a little while ago
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakihodo

sentence.kanji: その件でしたら、先程上司から許可を得ております。
sentence.romaji: sono ken deshitara sakihodo joushi kara kyoka wo ete orimasu
sentence.english: If you're referring to that matter, I obtained permission from my boss a little while ago.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaki

sentence.kanji: 夏季講習に申し込みした？
sentence.romaji: kaki koushuu ni moushikomi shita ？
sentence.english: Did you register for summer school?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rikou

sentence.kanji: あの犬はとても利口ですね。
sentence.romaji: ano inu ha totemo rikou desu ne
sentence.english: That dog is very clever.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's warai

sentence.kanji: あの家は笑いが絶えないね。
sentence.romaji: ano ie ha warai ga taenai ne
sentence.english: Laughter never stops in that house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's washitsu

sentence.kanji: この和室の天井は低いね。
sentence.romaji: kono washitsu no tenjou ha hikui ne
sentence.english: The ceiling in this Japanese-style room is low.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kona

sentence.kanji: その白い粉は赤ちゃんのミルクです。
sentence.romaji: sono shiroi kona ha akachan no miruku desu
sentence.english: The white powder is baby's milk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsubu

sentence.kanji: その子は大粒の涙を浮かべていたの。
sentence.romaji: sono ko ha ootsubu no namida wo ukabeteita no
sentence.english: The child's eyes were brimming with big tears.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chouwa

sentence.kanji: 彼女は自然と調和した暮らし方をしているの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha shizen to chouwa shita kurashi kata wo shite iru no
sentence.english: She lives her life in harmony with nature.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fude

sentence.kanji: 彼は筆で手紙を書いたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha fude de tegami wo kaita no
sentence.english: He wrote the letter with a brush.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's take

sentence.kanji: この笛は竹でできている。
sentence.romaji: kono fue ha take de dekite iru
sentence.english: This flute is made of bamboo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meibo

sentence.kanji: これが参加者の名簿です。
sentence.romaji: kore ga sankasha no meibo desu
sentence.english: This is a list of the participants.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sujimichi

sentence.kanji: 筋道を立てて考えなさい。
sentence.romaji: sujimichi wo tatete kangaenasai
sentence.english: Think logically.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suji

sentence.kanji: 転んで筋を痛めてしまいました。
sentence.romaji: koronde suji wo itamete shimaimashita
sentence.english: I fell down and damaged my tendon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toumei

sentence.kanji: ゴミは透明な袋に入れて出してください。
sentence.romaji: gomi ha toumei na fukuro ni irete dashite kudasai
sentence.english: Please put the garbage out in a clear plastic bag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yokyuu

sentence.kanji: 時には自分の欲求を抑えることも必要です。
sentence.romaji: tokiniha jibun no yokyuu wo osaeru koto mo hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: Sometimes I need to control my desires.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hodo

sentence.kanji: 冗談にも程がある。
sentence.romaji: joudan ni mo hodo ga aru
sentence.english: There are limits on jokes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ine

sentence.kanji: 日本は稲の品種が多いよ。
sentence.romaji: nipon ha ine no hinshu ga ooi yo
sentence.english: Japan has lots of varieties of rice.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kasegu

sentence.kanji: 彼はお金をだいぶ稼いだらしいよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha okane wo daibu kaseida rashii yo
sentence.english: I hear he earned a lot of money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meishou

sentence.kanji: みんなで製品の名称を考えました。
sentence.romaji: minna de seihin no meishou wo kangaemashita
sentence.english: Everyone thought about the name of the product.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ousama

sentence.kanji: その国の王様はとても賢い。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni no ousama ha totemo kashikoi
sentence.english: That country's king is very wise.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuubun

sentence.kanji: 秋分の日は毎年9月23日頃です。
sentence.romaji: shuubun no hi ha maitoshi kugatsu nijuusannichigoro desu
sentence.english: The Autumnal Equinox Day is about September 23rd every year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zeikin

sentence.kanji: これは税金の無駄遣いだね。
sentence.romaji: kore ha zeikin no mudazukai da ne
sentence.english: This is a waste of tax money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaori

sentence.kanji: この花はいい香りがしますね。
sentence.romaji: kono hana ha ii kaori ga shimasu ne
sentence.english: This flower smells good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kousui

sentence.kanji: 香水のいい香りがした。
sentence.romaji: kousui no ii kaori ga shita 。
sentence.english: There was a nice scent of perfume.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yawarageru

sentence.kanji: ユーモアは場の雰囲気を和らげるわね。
sentence.romaji: yu-moa ha ba no funiki wo yawarageru wa ne
sentence.english: Humor can soften the mood.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moyou

sentence.kanji: 彼女は水玉模様のスカートをはいているね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha mizutama moyou no suka-to wo haite iru ne
sentence.english: She's wearing a skirt with polka dots.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiku

sentence.kanji: 菊の花を買ってきました。
sentence.romaji: kiku no hana wo kate kimashita
sentence.english: I bought some chrysanthemums.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keiko

sentence.kanji: 相撲の稽古はとても厳しいよ。
sentence.romaji: sumou no keiko ha totemo kibishii yo
sentence.english: Training for Sumo wrestling is very tough.
